name: Brevity of Gravity
description:
This game was developed as a student project in 10 weeks in the School for Games in Berlin! For some of us, this was our first non-theory encounter with object orientated programming, Blender and 3D modeling, Game Design and so on.

Used tools: Godot, Blender, Adobe Photoshop, Procreate, Dragonbones, TortoiseHG with Mercurial, Google Drive, Trello.

Meet the Team!


Maresa A.
3D Modeling/Texturing 2D Concept Art, Illustration Level Art

2D Concept Art VFX, Animation, Level Art Assistant

2D 3D Modeling, UI/UX Design, SFX
